aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.p1: Starting with a two-day SQL training course in 2022, I have since created dozens of company reports based on Microsoft Dynamics NAV 2009 with Visual Studio 2008. If I have learned one thing in the process, it is that:
aboutMe.p2: With this mindset, I am now taking on the challenge of paving my way into software development.
aboutMe.p3: In my work, I combine analytical thinking with creativity and perseverance. I like to look at problems from different angles and work in a structured way to find clear, sustainable solutions. Teamwork is just as important to me as working independently.
aboutMe.p4: My passion is to improve things, and my goal is to achieve this with software.
skills.title: My skills
projects.subtext: Curious? Explore a selection of my previous projects here!
project.join: A Group-Project implementing a Kanban System, supported by Google-Firebase, to organize tasks within a Team. Add tasks, assign certain users to it and make sure to follow the Deadlines
project.sharkie: Object-Orientated 2D-Browser Game. Move Sharkie through the Deep Sea and face different Enemies.
project.pokedex: A Pokemon Library based on the PokéAPI.
reference.subtext: I thrive both independently and as part of a team. Here’s what my colleagues have to say about working with me.
reference.ozan: Sebastian's strength in understanding difficult tasks and breaking them down into smaller pieces and organizing them was extremely helpful to the group. He was always very cooperative and really helped the group with his feedback. With him, the work progressed very well. Everyone wants a Sebastian in their group.
reference.felix: Sebastian was an exemplary teammate in every respect during our group project Join. He was an extremely reliable and effective teammate in terms of both planning and organizational work and operational implementation. Even in challenging situations during the project, Sebastian always acted calmly and thoroughly and developed solutions with great commitment. He was a very valuable teammate in every respect, and I really enjoyed working with him.
footer.policy.text2: and agree to processing of my data as outlined
